Sequence Information.Peptide Name: B1CTcu1 (brevinin; natural AMPs; frog, amphibians, animals, UCLL1a)
Sequence Information.Source: skin secretions, the Indian bicoloured frog,Clinotarsus curtipes, Asia

Literature Information.Literature: APD analysis reveals that the sequence  is 75% similar toBrevinin-ALa. Active against S. aureus MTCC 9542 (MIC 12.5 ug/ml), B. coagulans ATCC 7050 (6.25 ug/ml), Gram- E. coli MG1655 10 ug.ml), and V. cholerae (12.5 ug/ml). This peptide is an interesting template for broad activity and poor hemolyis activity.
Literature Information.Author: Abraham P, George S, Kumar KS. 2014
Literature Information.Title: Novel antibacterial peptides from the skin secretion of the Indian bicoloured frog Clinotarsus curtipes.
